pages.text: GOD controls night DNI. This bol lekcia those possess oci
GOD created kazdy zivy creature z zavlazit! Some z them chodit ich brucho some chodit 2 noha some chodza 4. GOD creates whatever He wills. GOD bol Omnipotent
My sent ona clarifying revelations potom GOD guides whoever wills guided straight chodnicek
They say My verit v GOD posol my obey potom some z them slide chrbat afterwards! These je believers
When they invited GOD Jeho posol judge them some z them zvratit
if judgment bol ich favor they readily accept it
bol there disease ich srdce? Je they doubtful? Je they afraid lenze GOD Jeho posol treat them unfairly? Skutocne bol they bol unjust
Iba utterance believers whenever invited do GOD Jeho posol judge ich affairs je say My hear my obey These bol winners
Those obey GOD Jeho posol reverence GOD observe Him these bol triumphant jeden
They swear GOD solemnly ona commanded them mobilize they mobilize! Say nie swear. Obedience bol zavaznost. GOD JE fully Cognizant Z everything ONA ROBIT
